welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ciudad Hidalgo, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant destination has to offer!

restaurants.name: El Fogoncito
restaurants.description: El Fogoncito is a bbq joint located in Ciudad Hidalgo.
restaurants.address: Ciudad Hidalgo (Avenida Central), 30840 Ciudad Hidalgo, Chiapas

restaurants.name: La Palapa De Javi
restaurants.description: La Palapa De Javi is a botanero located in Ciudad Hidalgo.

restaurants.name: Vía Dulce
restaurants.description: Vía Dulce is a creperie located in Ciudad Higalgo.

restaurants.name: Pollo Compero
restaurants.description: Pollo Compero is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Los almendros Restaurant
restaurants.description: Los almendros Restaurant is a breakfast spot located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
